name: CampaignMember
description: Represents the association between a campaign and a lead or a contact.
summary:
The `CampaignMember` object in Salesforce represents the association between a campaign and a lead or contact. Here's a summary of its attributes:

1. **Identifiers and Timestamps:**
   - `Id` (ID): Unique identifier for the CampaignMember.
   - `CreatedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the record was created.
   - `CreatedById` (Reference): ID of the user who created the record.
   - `LastModifiedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the record was last modified.
   - `LastModifiedById` (Reference): ID of the user who last modified the record.
   - `SystemModstamp` (DateTime): Date and time when the record was last modified by the system.

2. **Campaign and Member References:**
   - `CampaignId` (Reference): ID of the associated campaign.
   - `LeadId` (Reference): ID of the associated lead.
   - `ContactId` (Reference): ID of the associated contact.
   - `LeadOrContactId` (Reference): ID of the associated lead or contact.
   - `LeadOrContactOwnerId` (Reference): ID of the owner of the associated lead or contact.

3. **Status and Response:**
   - `Status` (Picklist): Status of the campaign member.
   - `HasResponded` (Boolean): Indicates whether the member has responded to the campaign.
   - `FirstRespondedDate` (Date): Date when the member first responded to the campaign.

4. **Member Information:**
   - `Salutation` (Picklist): Salutation for the member.
   - `Name` (String): Name of the member.
   - `FirstName` (String): First name of the member.
   - `LastName` (String): Last name of the member.
   - `Title` (String): Title of the member.
   - `CompanyOrAccount` (String): Company or account of the member.
   - `Type` (String): Type of the member.

5. **Contact Information:**
   - `Street` (String): Street address of the member.
   - `City` (String): City of the member.
   - `State` (String): State of the member.
   - `PostalCode` (String): Postal code of the member.
   - `Country` (String): Country of the member.
   - `Email` (Email): Email address of the member.
   - `Phone` (Phone): Phone number of the member.
   - `Fax` (Phone): Fax number of the member.
   - `MobilePhone` (Phone): Mobile phone number of the member.

6. **Preferences and Source:**
   - `DoNotCall` (Boolean): Indicates whether the member prefers not to be called.
   - `HasOptedOutOfEmail` (Boolean): Indicates whether the member has opted out of emails.
   - `HasOptedOutOfFax` (Boolean): Indicates whether the member has opted out of faxes.
   - `LeadSource` (Picklist): Source of the lead.

7. **Other:**
   - `IsDeleted` (Boolean): Indicates whether the record is deleted.
   - `Description` (TextArea): Description of the campaign member.
label: Campaign Member
